description: Featuring our classic word graphic – and made to keep you super comfortable – the Captive is your next 24/7 tee. Combining soft, durable, organically grown cotton with performance polyester fibres, the 240gsm fabric is great for fall and winter. Gusseted underarms and light stretch give you freedom to move.
name: Arcteryx Captive Arc`Word LS Shirt - Mens
